title: 1907 Tecumseh MI Fred Merkle Rare RPPC Version

posts.post_title: 1907 Tecumseh MI Fred Merkle Rare RPPC Version
posts.post_content:
Price is net to me and includes shipping. Please pm.

1907 RPPC Fred Merkle Pre-Rookie Tecumseh Michigan. This is the rare real photo postcard version - there is a much more common print postcard.

$425 Paypal FF ($438 GS)
